articles.title: NBA vet Carmelo Anthony named FIBA World Cup global ambassador
articles.description: Team USA legend Carmelo Anthony alongside Spain's Pau Gasol and Luis Scola of Argentina will be promoting the 2023 FIBA Basketball World Cup, which will be held in the Philippines, Japan, and Indonesia from Aug. 25 to Sept. 10.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina government loses Senate power after senators exit coalition
articles.description: Argentina's ruling Peronist coalition was dealt a blow on Wednesday when four of its senators announced their departure, weakening the government's sway in the Senate just eight months before high-stakes general elections.
